Wisdom: الصَّبْرُ صَبْرَانِ صَبْرٌ فِي الْبَلَاءِ حَسَنٌ جَمِيلٌ وَأَحْسَنُ مِنْهُ الصَّبْرُ عَنِ الْمَحَارِمِ
enWisdom: Patience is of two types: enduring what you hate and abstaining from what you love
The best patience is abstaining from that which is loved [but prohibited]

Wisdom: إِنَّكَ لَنْ تُدْرِكَ مَا تُحِبُّ مِنْ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا بِالصَّبْرِ عَمَّا تَشْتَهِي
enWisdom: Verily you will never attain that which you love from your Lord except by refraining from that which you desire
